thread.title: Japan's Kobe Steel CEO to quit over quality scandal

title: Japan's Kobe Steel CEO to quit over quality scandal
text:
Japan's Kobe Steel CEO to quit over quality scandal Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 01:17 
Kobe Steel says its CEO will step down to take responsibility for a widespread data fraud scandal, although doubts remain over a corporate culture mired in wrongdoing and the possibility of future fines. Ryan Brooks reports.
